roleset.name: change from liquid to vapor
roleset.note: EVAPORATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'evaporate' based on sentences in wsj and automaticexpansion via verbnet. (from evaporate.01-v predicate notes)
EVAPORATION-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, evaporate.01. Corresponds to VNcls other_cos-45.4. (from evaporation.01-n)

example.name: ergative
example.text: Analysts were disappointed that the enthusiasm investors showed for stocks in the wake of Georgia-Pacific's $3.18 billion bid for Great Northern Nekoosa evaporated so quickly.
example.arg: the enthusiasm investors showed for stocks in the wake of Georgia-Pacific's $3.18 billion bid for Great Northern Nekoosa

example.name: agentive
example.text: The sun evaporated John's beer. Bogus, dude.

example.name: both args
example.text: This completely natural product contains only the naturally occurring mineral salts left after the sun's evaporation of sea water.
